description:
A survey by consulting giant McKinsey & Co. found that nearly 60 percent of senior executives said building a strong project management discipline is a top-three priority for their companies.

Executives discovered that adhering to project management methods and strategies reduced risks, cut costs and improved success rates for their businesses, no matter if there is a recession or not.

So, this is it. You've chosen a Project Management as your career and now prior to going for a project management certification program, you can't make up your mind, what credentials to get.

If so, this course is for YOU. Join us and learn more about Project Management methodologies and framework: PRINCE2, PMBoK and Six Sigma Basics.
title: Project Management: PRINCE2, PMBOK, SIX SIGMA Basics
